root.str: Now step up to the firing range.

Familiar conflicts test a newfound peace as the empires of Auraxis return to Oshur, the tropical island paradise that has remained untouched by battle for generations. Massive Exodus-class fleet carriers descend off the sandy shores, serving as a base of operations for the war hungry factions and providing access to the vital rebirthing matrices required to keep the wheels of war turning.
VS - Submachine Gun - Mid - V1 Description
The [*faction*] has linked to the north warpgate +[*points*] VP!
C-4 Explosives are capable of incredible damage to infantry and vehicles alike.

The label on this gift-wrapped explosive reads, "WARNING: Contents are not candy and may detonate if eaten."

Use Aim to throw a brick of C-4 and hold Fire to detonate. Limited event item.
The Drake is a 20mm heavy machine gun that is effective at damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.
The Paragon's Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rockets.
Adds 1 missile to the default magazine size.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Contains a NS-30 Vandal plus 1000 Certs
Increases the amount of damage the deployment shield can withstand by 60%.
Retrieve the NE-11 Portable Mining Laser
Kill a bounty target with a carbine.
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Magrider.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1200 rounds.
Apply the single use Zebra camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Celebrate the Fifth Anniversary of PlanetSide 2 with this decal. This decal can be applied to armor.
NC: Vehicle - Customization - PS2 Badge Promo
The Exodus Particle Projection Cannon is a ship-mounted defense platform used for ship to ship combat, and to ward off hostile aircraft.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Flash. TR use only.
Increasing this slider to the right will increase general mouse sensitivity. (Default: 0.25)
The Adrenaline Pump increases sprint speed while equipped.
Boosts the maximum strength of the personal shield of any passengers riding in the rumble seat by 166%
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
艾美瑞什 Grassland Armor Camo
A high density particle field that helps protect the user from injury. The shield will regenerate over time if not receiving damage.
Damage from impacts striking the top of the Lightning are reduced by an additional 10%.
Apply the Splatter camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
艾美瑞什 Grassland Vehicle Camo

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> That's cute. I'm sure you'll agree that it's a better if the Market has the last schematic. We'll have the full set! And that's better for everyone. See you when you're back on Sanctuary.
Take some time to get comfortable with shooting and familiarize yourself with your weapons and classes.
Unlock the CB-X75 with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
Apply the Digital Pumpkin camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Provides little protection from projectiles, but absorbs an incredible amount of force generated from anti-personnel mines.
Unlock the XMG-200 with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
Increases the speed at which an Infiltrator can hack enemy equipment terminals by 30%.
The New Conglomerate has taken Dahaka!

Unlocks the Hardlight Canopy for your tactical loadout slot. Canopies are resupplied using Merit points.

Single use consumable. Max 1 between resupplies.
Deploy a generator that creates a hardlight canopy. The canopy appears a few meters above the generator and blocks incoming projectiles from above. Only 1 canopy can be active at a time.
Customize your Flash with this classy antenna ball. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
Unlocking ASP2 will reset Battle Rank to 1, and unlock even more class modifications at every 25 ranks. You will keep all existing class modifications and unspent points.
Detects the movement of hostile enemies within 60 meters the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.
The anti-vehicle Phalanx Turret offers great defense against ground vehicles with its high explosive rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
Increases Merit & XP gains by 50% for 1 month. Boost can only be used on this character.
Improve the Chimera's maximum forward speed and acceleration.
While active, the Transport Cloak drains the ANT's stored Cortium in exchange for limited invisibility.
Generates a dense mesh of nanites around the soldier that decays slowly while active, and absorbs up to 450 damage before failing. Regenerates to full in 31 seconds.
A rare residue formed and ablated when meteorites enter Auraxis' atmosphere.
Allows cortium to be used to create a banner displaying your faction logo.
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.

Celebrate your independence with a burst of stars and stripes thrusting you upward.

Limited event item, expires August 1st.
Select the microphone or input device that you would like to use for voice chat
Cannot invite [*target*] to your platoon because you are not the leader.
Adds orange chassis lights to the under carriage of the Flash. NC use only.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Increases the time it takes to lock-on to the vehicle by 1.5 seconds and prevents the vehicle from automatically appearing to hostiles based on proximity or radar detection.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 96 rounds.
Genudine Dynamics' bulky Havoc GD-4 is known for its rapid, accurate fire.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Liberator by 9KPH.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.15 seconds.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Mosquito by 180 seconds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
The Hailstorm LRB Rotary Cannon fires armor piercing rounds which are ideal for inflicting heavy damage to armored targets
Apply the Urban Forest camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Grants access to a Spawn Beacon that when deployed allows squad members to hot drop in the vicinity.
Taking fall damage will cloak you for 2.5 seconds. Firing a weapon will reveal you.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 150 rounds.

Uplink has achieved minimum distance.
Uplink ready to receive target data.
Improved traction, turning, brakes, and reverse speed. (More effective than previous rank)
Celebrate the Fifth Anniversary of PlanetSide 2 with this decal. This decal can be applied to vehicles.
VS - Heavy Pistol - Mid - V4 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 113 rounds.

When activated, the vehicle is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields and avoid damage caused by collisions with other vehicles. Lasts 15 seconds. Can be activated once every 47 seconds.
[*player*] has invited you to join the outfit, [*guild*].

The Vortex VM21 fires a charged particle beam that punches through vehicle armor with incredible accuracy and speed. Holding down fire will accumulate charges, dealing more damage while consuming more ammo. VS use only.
Apply the Digital Pumpkin camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Increases Magburner's recharge speed and side to side mobility.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 150 rounds.
Could not transfer leadership due to bad group.
Bunker will not be available until the new placement system is complete
The Terran Republic has defended Mao!
Detects the movement of hostile enemies within 100 meters of the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> Ultimately you were able to resolve all critical issues preventing the launch of our Containment Sites as well as discovering a more efficient path to reaching the resource-filled Desolation asteroid chain. While your efforts have been appreciated, operative, we request that you return to the front lines at your earliest convenience.
ANTs, a specialized form of ground vehicle, can harvest Cortium nodes found on any continent.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 56 missiles.
Escort your Payload Drone to its destination.
Increases the lock-on range of the weapon by 20 meters.
The Nanite Systems Wildcat Tank Destroyer Cannon fires rounds that are extremely effective against close range targets.
The ANT Collector Tool is used to gather resources from a node.
In this training area grief points have been disabled so it's OK to practice and make mistakes here.
Increases the range of the Scrambler

Clown on your enemies in this simple grease facepaint.
+10% xp when worn
This item is only usable during Nanite of the Living Dead events.

The Cycler TRV's fast rate of fire makes it extremely effective in close quarters, though that same rate of fire and high recoil limits its effectiveness at long range when firing in full-auto. TR use only.

Increases healing by 50% and revive speed 65%. Revives MAX units at 20% health.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.
Applies a Nero decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Find an outfit that best fits you!
<font color="#00FFAA">Engineering:</font> Explosions reported throughout the bastion hull. Abandon Ship!

<font color="#00FFAA">Shipping Centers</font> - If we're going to recover anything of value from Oshur, we'll need new shipping centers. Having an easy port of entry to offload resources will also help facilitate additional construction throughout the island.
Adds 75 rounds to the default magazine size.
Reduces weight penalty for heavy weapons.
This bundle includes an assortment of Darkstar VS Helmets at one great discount!
Join Combat will drop you into a fight where you're needed. Press "J" (default) to activate it.
Increases the top speed of the Magrider by 6 KPH.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
This item 50% off for 24 hours only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2 rounds.
The anti-personnel Phalanx Turret's rapid fire capabilities make it excellent for suppressing enemy infantry.
Get the most popular Reaver weapons at a discounted price!
Kill enemies that are wearing a Halloween mask with the NS CandyCannon 3000.
A standardized reflex sight designed to promote faster precision aiming.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Vanguard by 360 seconds.
Apply the Hyper camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Nanite based tool specialized to repair mechanical systems.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "O" Gold Hood Ornament.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Throw a temporary jump booster onto the battlefield. Allies standing near the booster have their jump height greatly increased. <font color="#dc9c36">Expires at the end of the Campaign.</font>
<font color="#00FFAA">???:</font> I've cut Foster's line of communication to you for the time being. Enjoy the break while you can.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 45 rounds.
Apply the White camo pattern to your vehicle.
Applies a decal to your vehicle.

Designed by parents too tired to chase their children around in the summer heat, the Mega Soldier Soaker lobs volatile water balloons from a distance. Fun for the whole family!

Can only be equipped during the Summer Fun event.
Adds chassis lights to the under carriage of the Chimera. NSO use only.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Walk up to an equipment terminal and interact with it.
These are your basic movement controls.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Welcome to Oshur, a premier battleground if ever there was one. It has a lot to teach even the most jaded of us, soldier, so be prepared to listen.
Class based passive skill lines and general leadership skills like the Squad Beacon.
Restores 50 health per second to allied aircraft within 75 meters and allied ground vehicles within 50 meters, and does not affect the Galaxy itself.
The Pulsar VS1 is the standard issue assault rifle for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its low recoil design allows it to remain effective in most situations. VS use only.
Get started on the right foot with this bundle designed specifically for Heavy Assault Troopers!
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Forest v2 camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
The facility's lost, fall back and regroup!
Apply the single use Forest Greyscale camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Customize your Flash with this red antenna ball. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 225 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 50 rounds.
Earn Spot Assists to complete this directive.
You have been removed from the vehicle queue because you revived.
Buy the Two-Year Anniversary Bundle and get a free 6 Month Heroic Boost on each of your characters! (Boosts will be granted after the Anniversary Sale has ended, dates to be announced!)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 9 shells.
Customize your Dervish with armor plating. NSO use only.
A laser sight increases the user's hipfire accuracy by 33%.
Allows 1 additional grenade of any type to be carried.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Emerson:</font> You here for the job offer? My name is Facilitator Emerson. If you sign on the dotted line with Nanite Systems, I'll be the one directing your day to day operations.
The C85-H fires a canister of heavy shrapnel that is effective against infantry and light armor. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 7.5%
Increases the top speed of the Reaver by 4 KPH.
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the ANT's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.

This variant of the Archer Anti-Materiel Rifle was designed to operate at closer distances, relying on snappy close range optics and quicker draw times in exchange for long range power and magazine size.
An expiring [*faction*] core has gone neutral!
Apply the One-Year Anniversary camo pattern to your weapon.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Apply the Patriot camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
This customization adds a White decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 240 rounds.
Apply the Hyper camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 21 shells.
The T1S Cycler performs well at many ranges, attributing its adaptability due to its multiple fire modes. TR use only.
Allows cortium to be used to construct a Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret that may be manned by allied players.
Unlock the MGR-L1 Promise with a full complement of attachments. For NC use only.
Darius Shield recharges faster when offline. From 0 to full within 20 seconds.
Hello operative. Based on the data you've provided, we have confirmed that the collapse of the Northeastern Warpgate has, indeed, been the cause of the weather abnormalities in the region.
Unlocks access to Carbines. Does not include Directive reward weapons. Combat Medic only.
Increases the amount of personal XP earned by 50%
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.45 seconds.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 5%
Apply the single use Indar Scrub camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Adding Radar will allow you to see enemy vehicles on your minimap.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Operative, we need combat trained pilots. Fly to the specified areas and deploy additional Storm Buoys or clear out any enemy aircraft that may threaten the research.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Reaver by 480 seconds.
Volatile hardlight bolts detonate on impact, causing up to 200 damage over 2 meters. Increases the fire delay by 0.2 seconds and direct damage is reduced by 250.
When you're out in the field, keep in mind that the "J" key will trigger Join Combat. Join Combat will always place you in the middle of a battle.
Allows the user to carry and place one additional anti-tank mine. Rank 2 allows for one additional anti-personnel mine, or two additional anti-tank mines.
The Beamer VS3 is the standard sidearm for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its high rate of fire allows the user to eliminate nearby targets quickly. VS use only.
Modified Drop Pod shell with an in-built heater for cold-weather deployments.
Warpgate terminals allow long range transportation for infantry units. It allows a soldier to travel to any linked location in an instant.
[*target*] has declined the invitation to join the outfit.

DAYBREAK CASH
Used to purchase cosmetics, boosts, and other items. More DBC can be purchased in the Depot.
Motion detect experience is earned when teammates kill enemy players that you have detected with the Recon Detection Device or Motion Spotter.
Generates a decaying shield of nanites around the soldier that mitigates 35% damage instead of preventing it. Damage taken does not cause this shield to drain more quickly. Lasts up to 9 seconds.

The long-range Sniper Optics 7 scope uses standard mil-dot sighting and 7x magnification to allow for mid and long range shots.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rockets.
Apply the Zebra camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Thank you for becoming a Member!
Unlock performance upgrades that increase the speed of the vehicle.
INCLUDING XP BOOST HOLIDAY HATS AND AN ALL IN ONE HOLIDAY BUNDLE!
Could not be invited because player is not the squad leader.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
Apply the Jungle Forest camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
Allows cortium to be used to create a banner displaying your faction logo. NC only.
[*player*]'s Alarm Module: Enemies detected nearby in the [*region*] region!
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Scrub Weapon Camo
On a headshot kill, instantly restore 140 shield.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 13.125%
Apply the Starburst camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 10%
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Trouble certainly seems to find its way to Esamir, soldier. Prep your Engineer loadout and head to the nearest friendly Containment Site.
Activate to repair 20% of the MAX's health over 12 seconds. Can be activated once every 45 seconds.

The demand for Auraxium remains high even after the completion of the Containment Facilities on Esamir. Nascent Expeditions, allied with the Nanite Systems Operatives, issue contracts for any soldier willing to collect the crystals unearthed by their monstrous Elysium Drills.
Apply the Northern Forest camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.

Vehicle shields have a tank icon displayed on the shield. This type of energy shield prohibits hostile vehicles from passing through.To disable this shield, overload the generator marked by your waypoint.
Unlock the Giraffe camo pattern for your armor, weapons and vehicles. All factions can use this gear.
You automatically repair 1% health every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.
External Fuel Tanks also increase the maximum capacity of afterburner fuel by 40%.

FILTERS allow you to customize what information is displayed on the map.

The TERRITORY CONTROL filter colors regions based on which empire owns them. Darkened regions do not generate RESOURCES for your empire. Only regions that are connected to your WARPGATE via friendly territory will generate resources. In order to capture an enemy region, you will need to have friendly territory adjacent to it.

<font color="#00FFAA">Cortium Conductors</font> - We know there's Cortium on Oshur, lucky for us. Unlucky for us is that there was never an infrastructure in place to take advantage of it. We'll need to set up refineries and a lattice network to keep the lights on, not to mention power the rebirthing matrix.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 228 rounds.
Increases xp and resource gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 1 hour. Boost can only be used on this character.
Sunderer vehicles can also be equipped with a mobile spawn capability.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Alright, so here's the run down. I've received a procurement request for an item that's locked behind some pretty heavy security. To bypass the security we, well, I mean you, will need three Encryption Keys.
Further reduces the time to transition in and out of Sprint Mode.
Your outfit details have been saved.
While equipped, the player will be able to locate campaign targets from much further away. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.</font>

Strike fear into your opponents with this skeletal facepaint.
+10% xp when worn
This item is only usable during Nanite of the Living Dead events.
Adds the Drifter style hubcaps to your Harasser. TR use only.
Adds 2 rockets to the default magazine size.
Adds orange chassis lights to the under carriage of the Harasser. VS use only.
Contains a PDW-16 Hailstorm plus 1000 Certs

This is a sabotage training mission, soldier. Locate and overload an enemy shield generator to reduce a facility's defensive capabilities. Base shields can sometimes prevent our vehicles and infantry from infiltrating the enemy's perimeter. Enable tracking on this mission and we'll pinpoint our generator on your map and HUD. Locate and overload this generator to help break the enemy's defenses.
The Vanu Sovereignty has taken Saurva!
<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly</font> However, we also want combat data. So head to an allied Biolab, preferrably one that's under attack, and interact with a console there. You'll feel the juice.
A Supply Convoy is forming at the allied Warpgate.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.75 seconds.
Use tier 4 implants to create a tier 5 implant!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 33 rockets.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
The outfit tag was changed to '[*alias*]'.

The NS-11C's more compact frame is closely modeled after the successful NS-11A Assault Rifle line of rifles, making it a viable close range option over its predecessor. All factions can use NS weapons.
Increases the lock-on disruption to 9 seconds.
Flak Armor provides improved protection from nearby explosions.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 175 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 6 KPH.
Use Wielded Melee Attack To Collect
The Hoplon Phalanx Tower rapidly fires high velocity anti-aircraft rounds that are effective against lightly armored targets.
Reduces damage taken from C4 by 5%
This armor can only be worn by the VS Light Assault.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 500 rounds.
Apply the Diced camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 shells.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Razor Fins. NC use only.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 10%
Each weapon recoils differently. Learn a weapon's pattern and compensate for it by moving your crosshairs in the opposite direction while you fire.
Customize your Liberator with these sleek Viper Fins. TR use only.
The EM6's incredible adaptability on the field makes it popular among NC soldiers. NC use only.
The Vanguard defensive certification 'Reinforced Side Armor' has been removed. Spent certifications have been refunded.
Increases resource gain by 50% for 3 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
Apply the African Forest camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Infiltrator: Kill a Light Assault, Heavy Assault, Heavy Weapons, Infiltrator, Medic, Engineer and Sniper
Galaxy Death From Above Glass Decal
Capture and hold all 3 Tech Plants on Indar
Apply the Clover camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Contains a T2 Striker plus 1000 Certs
Further reduces the amount of damage taken from explosions.
Enables the Galaxy to deploy into an Advanced Mobile Station. The AMS acts as a respawn point for friendly soldiers.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> A solar-powered outhouse? These were created by several of the Oshur resorts to create a sort of rustic ambiance. Apparently this one still works.
The additional zoom depth offered by the Valley RF allows versatility when moving between short and medium range engagements.
<font color='#CC200D'>COMPLETE CHAPTER %0, THEN RETURN TO CONTINUE YOUR EXPEDITION.</font>
Repair the Hydroponics Bay Lab Shield Console
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Magrider. VS use only.
Holding down the sprint key while moving will make you run faster.
Creates a smoke screen around the vehicle that prevents lock-on attempts. Reuse time: 25 seconds.
Failed to create '[*guild*]'. Name already taken.
About time you showed up, soldier! We're giving you #count([*cert_points*]) so you can get back to the front lines!
Apply the Indar Dry Brush camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the top speed of the Galaxy by 16 KPH.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 40 ms.
When engaged, the afterburner burns fuel to increase the Liberator's top speed. An empty fuel tank regenerates in 26.7 seconds.
Allows the Infiltrator to cloak for a short period of time. Movement reduces the effectiveness of the cloak.
Provides a reload bonus for all weapons when both seats are occupied.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Multiple revives from allies charges your self-revive.
Use an Equipment Terminal to switch to a loadout with the Lightning Arrester equipped in the Tactical slot.
Upon being revived, you become cloaked for the next 2.25 seconds. Firing your weapon will remove this effect.
Cannot exit vehicle until directed to by the training program.
Use to toggle the redeploy countdown. When the countdown completes you will be able to choose a respawn location and redeploy there.
Instantly increase your Loyalty Level by upgrading your Membership Plan!
The lightweight T4 Automatic Machine Pistol is capable of accurate fire from both the sights and the hip.
The Routing Spire allows the user to equip a deployable spawnpoint Router.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Primary: LMG: NC6S Gauss SAW S
The Rail Gun Tank Destroyer is a high damage cannon that is used by the New Conglomerate against enemy tanks
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 5%
You're proven skills are required once again by your fellow soldiers waiting for you in their squad. Waste no time and join them.
Are you sure you want to unequip this item?

<font color="#00FFAA">Tolland:</font> Certain rocks, like Auraxium, crystallized Polystellarite and Synthium, are capable of being liquified with this mining laser. Don't try that on Cortium though... it's a little explodey.
Insufficient privileges to speak in this chat channel.
The simulation is almost complete. There is one more thing. Follow the arrows to the top of that tower.
Adds an additional power rail to the MAX's capacitor allowing the capacitor to begin recharging while being discharged; this reduces the delay between uses.
Apply the Ink Spots camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 shots.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 rockets.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "Z" Hood Ornament.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 7 shells.
Save 15% off Construction Depot Category purchases for a limited time!
Apply the single use Jungle Forest camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

<font color="#00FFAA">Injured Researcher:</font> Pity we weren't able to finish. That tidal wave really messed us up. Don't think Sherman will be able to collect. I'll be fine. Just need a nap and I'll be right as rain.
Grants access to grenades which simulate the sound of weapons fire, project false radar signatures, and fool automated anti-infantry turrets.
Apply the Phoenix camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Increases the weapon's reload speed by 14%.

The weapon's muzzle flash and noise generation is reduced, and the player no longer appears on the minimap when firing. In exchange, the weapon's damage falls off 20 meters sooner, and bullet velocity is reduced by 15%.
A 8x magnitude zoom precision sniper scope.
Apply the single use Urban Forest camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Allow players to automatically join your outfit without applying.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2 bombs.
<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin</font> Our enemies would deny us from obtaining the planet's resources. It is now your duty to prevent them from doing so.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 280 rounds.
Could not join because the squad is full.
Flak Armor provides improved protection from nearby explosions.
Infiltrator: Kill 50 enemy Medics that are healing an enemy
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 10%
Apply the single use Woodland camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
To <font color="#7ff4ff">remove</font> a component from the construction panel, just <font color="#7ff4ff">re-select</font> it from the panel. It's really that simple!
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 9.375%
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Blue Sparkler Hood Ornament. NC use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> Real nice work there. You sure you aren't from The Interface? Well, guess not or I probably wouldn't know your name. Mission complete, at any rate.
Apply the Petal camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Outfit War is unavailable at this time.
On a separate note, The Brass also expressed some interest in controlling territory so that our scientists aren't disrupted. Looks like they're on to something big.
Adds cosmetic plating to your Liberator. NC use only.
Apply the Petal camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Earn 50 Transport Kill Assists while piloting a Galaxy or Valkyrie.

Generates a decaying shield of nanites 7 meters around the soldier that mitigates 25% damage to nearby allies for up to 9.6 seconds. Damage taken does not cause this shield to drain more quickly.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Heavy Assault: Kill 10 enemies when you're at full health
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Nalla:</font> Have you spoken with Coordinator Tolland on the observation deck? He'll have more information about what to expect out in the field.
The PMG-200 opts for better per-bullet stopping power and snappy reloads, at cost to its magazine size. NSO use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Looks like you lost your vehicle and cargo, slick.

Sunderer spawns are the backbone of our rapid deployment system, without them we wouldn't have enough soldiers on the front lines to sustain a drawn out assault. Bring a Sunderer into contested territory and deploy it, your fellow soldiers will appreciate the support.
